data.comment: Kick-off has been delayed.
The match has started at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 5, Vancouver to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake drives towards goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Important block from the Vancouver defence as Maikel Chang fires in a strike for Salt Lake.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Kyle Beckerman (Salt Lake) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Kevin Stott awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Kevin Stott blows against Vancouver's Fredy Montero for offside.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Vancouver.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Donny Toia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 14, Fredy Montero (Vancouver) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Vancouver.
Janio Bikel for Vancouver has been booked by Kevin Stott and receives a first yellow card.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Pablo Ruiz's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Vancouver's area.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Kevin Stott signals a Vancouver throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Free kick Salt Lake.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 25, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sandy Salt Lake attack through Maikel Chang. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 28, Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Salt Lake's Albert Rusnak gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Kyle Beckerman (Salt Lake) strikes at Rio Tinto Stadium but his header is cleared.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 32, Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Kevin Stott awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 35, Attention is being given to Vancouverâ€™s David Milinkovic and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
David Milinkovic has recovered and rejoins the match in Sandy.
In the minute 36, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Marcelo Silva (Salt Lake) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ali Adnan (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Vancouver at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Kevin Stott signals a Vancouver throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
In the minute 45, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Vancouver's Ali Adnan misses with an attempt on goal.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Rio Tinto Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over at Rio Tinto Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Salt Lake push forward at Rio Tinto Stadium and Pablo Ruiz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 47, Marcelo Silva's header is off-target for Salt Lake.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 51, Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Kevin Stott awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Goal! Vancouver have got their heads in front thanks to a David Milinkovic strike.
In the minute 53, Cristian Dajome instrumental with a fine assist.
David Milinkovic is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
David Milinkovic, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Lucas Cavallini is the substitute for Vancouver.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 60, Marc Dos Santos is making the team's second substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Michael Baldisimo replacing Janio Bikel.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 63, Kyle Beckerman (Salt Lake) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 67, In Sandy, Maikel Chang of Salt Lake is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Vancouver's area.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 68, Salt Lake's Donny Toia has been booked in Sandy.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Salt Lake.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Donny Toia with Corey Baird. This is the first substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
The match at Rio Tinto Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Russell Teibert, who is down injured.
In the minute 73, Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a third change, with Leonard Owusu replacing the possibly injured Russell Teibert.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 75, Kevin Stott signals a Vancouver throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Vancouver are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Fredy Montero (Vancouver) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 80, Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Justin Meram.
In the minute 81, Great play from Maikel Chang to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Albert Rusnak gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Vancouver at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Lucas Cavallini puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Fredy Montero with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Fredy Montero with Andy Rose.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 89, Pablo Ruiz of Salt Lake gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kevin Stott awards Vancouver a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corey Baird (Salt Lake) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
9 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Jeizon Ramirez is on a sub for Justin Meram for Salt Lake.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Thomas Hasal has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corey Baird (Salt Lake) has received a yellow card from Kevin Stott.
Salt Lake make their third substitution with Christopher Garcia replacing Maikel Chang.
